about_the_game:
Captain, your vessel has crash-landed on a barren planet! Life support is failing, your only choice is to dig deep and unearth the resources needed to refuel, repair, and re-launch! Send expeditions deep below the planet's surface, but beware of hazards and pitfalls. When your crew perishes, you will need to make the difficult decision to wake the passengers in a bid for survival. Every life pod's hiss is a death sentence for the poor soul within, but inaction will certainly doom us all.

This game combines classic mining mechanics with a linear story, meaningful choices, and a clear goal. Manage your time and resources carefully as you forge a path back to the stars.

Your sleeping passengers have 72 hours to live. Mine for fuel to extend the deadline, then explore deeper to find the resources you need to repair and expand.

Send an away mission to an ore vein deep beneath the surface, and harvest everything you need to survive. Return within the time limit, then begin planning the next mission.

Play it safe and use your resources to upgrade the miner, or pour all of your earnings into story progression. Be careful, playing it safe isn't always the best option.

Cave in! Losing a miner doesn't always spell disaster. Send a rescue mission to save a life, or to recover some of the valuable upgrades you just lost.

We're out of options! Decide who's life is worth saving, and who's life is worth sacrificing. Did we still succeed if we return home with an empty vessel?

short_description: Explore the depths of a barren planet in a desperate attempt to repair and re-fuel your crashed starliner. Craft upgrades and establish outposts while managing time, crew, and supplies. When an expedition is lost to the depths, will you risk sending a rescue mission, or preserve the few who remain?
